A Book by Ian K. Judge-Lord Chapter 1 Merry Christmas This is a book by You (2021). It will be published as a gitbook website: https://ianjudgelord.github.io/book an ebook: https://ianjudgelord.github.io/book/book.epub a book-typeset pdf: https://ianjudgelord.github.io/book/book.pdf Download the Word version of your book at https://ianjudgelord.github.io/book/book.docx, add content (writing, pictures, whatever), and send it to me. I will upload your edits. Or, you can edit it yourself at https://github.com/ianjudgelord/book/blob/main/body.md References
